HOW TO USE?

  1. Select your desired Shupon.
  2. Show Shupon to staff upon ordering/payment and hit Use Now.
  3. Shupons will be live for only 2 minutes so please ensure you are at the store before utilizing.
  4. Shupons will strictly not be refunded once utilized.
  5. Selected Shupons are of limited quantities only so use them before they run out.
